content.json:
## Importing CSV Data into Watchlists

This workbook requires you to import two CSV files into specific Watchlists:
1. [**CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1.csv**](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Solutions/Corelight/Watchlists/Corelight-AggregationsEnrichment/CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1.csv) ->  CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1 Watchlist
2. [**CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2.csv**](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Solutions/Corelight/Watchlists/Corelight-AggregationsEnrichment/CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2.csv) -> CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2 Watchlist

## Import Process
- Navigate to Microsoft Sentinel
- Access the Watchlists section
- Select the appropriate Watchlist (**CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1** or **CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2**)
- Choose **Update watchlist** -> **Bulk update**
- Upload the corresponding CSV file
- Proceed through **Next: Review + create**
- Finalize by clicking **Update**

Repeat these steps for both Watchlists to ensure all data is properly imported.

parameters.name: ImpactScore
parameters.label: Impact Score
parameters.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| mv-expand sid
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or did == ('{Entity}')) and isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist        ('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where isnotempty(impact_score)
| distinct impact_score
| sort by impact_score desc

parameters.name: Category
parameters.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| mv-expand sid
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or did == ('{Entity}')) and isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist        ('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where isnotempty(category)
| distinct category
| sort by category asc

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or did == ('{Entity}')) and
        isnotempty(did)
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| distinct did
| count
content.title: Alert Groupings

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or did == ('{Entity}')) and
        isnotempty(uid)
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| distinct uid
| count
content.title: Impacted Connections

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or did == ('{Entity}'))
| where local_resp == "true"
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| count
content.title: Impacted Internal Hosts

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or did == ('{Entity}'))
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}')) and
        isnotempty(technique_number)
| distinct technique_number
| count
content.title: MITRE Techniques

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or did == ('{Entity}'))
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| summarize impact_score = max(impact_score)
| extend impact_score = iif(isempty(impact_score), "N/A", impact_score)
content.title: Highest Impact Score

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or did == ('{Entity}'))
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}')) and
        isnotempty(category)
| summarize Count = count() by category
| top 1 by Count
content.title: Most Seen Category

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or did == ('{Entity}'))
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| count
content.title: Alerts/Signatures

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or did == ('{Entity}'))
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}')) and
        isnotempty(cve_number)
| count
content.title: Alerts with CVEs

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or did == ('{Entity}'))
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| extend cve_creation_date = todatetime(cve_creation_date)
| summarize Oldest_CVE_Date = min(cve_creation_date)
| extend Oldest_CVE_Date = iff(isempty(Oldest_CVE_Date), "N/A", format_datetime(Oldest_CVE_Date, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))
content.title: Oldest CVE Date

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or did == ('{Entity}'))
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}')) and
        isnotempty(impact_score)
| summarize avg_impact_score = avg(toreal(impact_score))
| project avg_impact_score = iff(isnan(avg_impact_score), toreal(0), round(avg_impact_score, 2))
content.title: Average Impact Score

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or did == ('{Entity}')) and
        isnotempty(did)
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| summarize ["MITRE Technique"] = make_set_if(technique_name, isnotempty(technique_name)), Categories = make_set_if(category, isnotempty(category)), Signatures = make_set_if(signatures, isnotempty(signatures)), Impact = make_set_if(impact_score, isnotempty(impact_score)), Connections = dcount(uid) by did
| extend ["MITRE Technique"] = strcat_array(["MITRE Technique"], ", "), Categories = strcat_array(Categories, ", "), Signatures = strcat_array(Signatures, ", "),
         Impact = strcat_array(Impact, ", ")
| project-rename ["Aggregation ID"] = did
content.title: Alert Aggregations Data

content.json: #### Click on above Aggregation ID to view *Alert Aggregation Details*

content.query: print '{agg_id}'
content.title: Aggregation ID

content.query: print "Suricata"
content.title: Alert Type

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1))
| where did == '{agg_id}' and isnotempty(uid)
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| distinct uid
| count
content.title: Total Connections

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1))
| where did == '{agg_id}'
| mv-expand sid, id_orig_h = orig_h
| where isnotempty(sid) and isnotempty(id_orig_h)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| distinct tostring(id_orig_h)
| count
content.title: Unique Sources

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1))
| where did == '{agg_id}'
| mv-expand sid, id_resp_h = resp_h
| where isnotempty(sid) and isnotempty(id_resp_h)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| distinct tostring(id_resp_h)
| count
content.title: Unique Destinations

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1))
| where did == '{agg_id}'
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| where isnotempty(cve_number)
| distinct cve_number
| count
content.title: Noted CVEs

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1))
| where did == '{agg_id}'
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| summarize cve_impact_score = max(cve_impact_score)
| extend cve_impact_score = iif(isempty(cve_impact_score), "N/A", cve_impact_score)
content.title: Highest CVE Impact Score

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1))
| where did == '{agg_id}'
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| summarize impact_score = max(impact_score)
| extend impact_score = iif(isempty(impact_score), "N/A", impact_score)
content.title: Highest Impact Score

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1))
| where did == '{agg_id}'
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}')) and
        isnotempty(attack_reason)
| distinct ["Attack Reason"] = attack_reason
content.title: Alert Insight

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1))
| where did == '{agg_id}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by did
| mv-expand sid
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))      
| project SID = sid, Signature = substring(signatures, 1, strlen(signatures)-2), ["Impact Score"] = impact_score, ["MITRE Attack Phase"] = attack_phase,
          Category = category, ["MITRE Technique"] = technique_name, ["Technique #"] = technique_number, ["Traffic Direction"] = traffic_direction
content.title: Associated Suricata Alerts

content.query:
corelight_suri_aggregations
| where ('*' == ('{Entity}') or (array_index_of(orig_h,('{Entity}')) != -1) or (array_index_of(resp_h,('{Entity}')) != -1))
| where did == '{agg_id}'
| mv-expand sid
| where isnotempty(sid)
| extend sid = tostring(sid)
| lookup (union isfuzzy=true _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment1'), _GetWatchlist('CorelightAggregationsEnrichment2')) on sid
| where ('*' in ({ImpactScore}) or impact_score in ({ImpactScore})) and
        ('*' == ('{Category}') or category == ('{Category}'))
| extend orig_h = strcat_array(orig_h, ","), resp_h = strcat_array(resp_h, ",")
| project UID = uid, Timestamp = format_datetime(todatetime((array_sort_desc(ts))[0]), 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'), Source = orig_h, Destination = resp_h
content.title: Associated Connections

content.json: #### Click a connection from above to see the associated logs. Log types with data are highlighted green. If a Suricata payload is found for a given session, it will appear in the lower panel labeled Payload.

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(uid_s: string, TenantId: string, SourceSystem: string, MG: string, ManagementGroupName: string, Computer: string, RawData: string, _ResourceId: string)[];

union isfuzzy=true
Corelight*, dummy_table
| where uid_s == ('{uid}')
| project-away TenantId, SourceSystem, MG, ManagementGroupName, Computer, RawData, _ResourceId
content.title: All Logs per UID

content.query:
corelight_conn
| where uid == ('{uid}')
| project spcap_url

corelight_conn
| where uid == ('{uid}')
| extend tunnel_parents = strcat_array(todynamic(tunnel_parents), ", "), suri_ids = strcat_array(todynamic(suri_ids), ", "),
         apps = strcat_array(todynamic(apps), ", "), app = strcat_array(app, ", "), id_orig_h_n_vals = strcat_array(todynamic(id_orig_h_n_vals), ", "),
         id_resp_h_n_vals = strcat_array(todynamic(id_resp_h_n_vals), ", ")
content.title: Connection Details For UID: {uid}

content.query:
corelight_http
| where uid == ('{uid}')
| extend proxied = strcat_array(todynamic(proxied), ", "), orig_mime_types = strcat_array(todynamic(orig_mime_types), ", "),
         orig_fuids = strcat_array(todynamic(orig_fuids), ", "), resp_fuids = strcat_array(todynamic(resp_fuids), ", "),
         tags = strcat_array(todynamic(tags), ", "), resp_mime_types = strcat_array(todynamic(resp_mime_types), ", "),
         http_content_type = strcat_array(todynamic(http_content_type), ", "), server_headers = strcat_array(todynamic(server_headers), ", "),
         client_headers = strcat_array(todynamic(client_headers), ", "), resp_filenames = strcat_array(todynamic(resp_filenames), ", "),
         orig_filenames = strcat_array(todynamic(orig_filenames), ", "), object = strcat_array(todynamic(object), ", ")
content.title: HTTP Details For UID: {uid}

content.query:
corelight_ssl
| where uid == ('{uid}')
| extend cert_chain_fps = strcat_array(todynamic(cert_chain_fps), ","), client_cert_chain_fps = strcat_array(todynamic(client_cert_chain_fps), ","), fingerprint = strcat_array(todynamic(fingerprint), ",")
content.title: SSL Details For UID: {uid}

content.query:
corelight_dns
| where uid == ('{uid}')
| extend TTLs = strcat_array(todynamic(TTLs), ","), answers = strcat_array(todynamic(answers), ","), ttl = strcat_array(todynamic(ttl), ",")
content.title: DNS Details For UID: {uid}

content.query:
corelight_files
| where uid == ('{uid}')
| extend analyzers = strcat_array(todynamic(analyzers), ", "), tx_hosts = strcat_array(todynamic(tx_hosts), ", "),
         rx_hosts = strcat_array(todynamic(rx_hosts), ", "), conn_uids = strcat_array(todynamic(conn_uids), ", "), 
         extracted = strcat_array(todynamic(extracted), ", "), dest_host = strcat_array(todynamic(dest_host), ", "),
         src_host = strcat_array(todynamic(src_host), ", ")
content.title: Files Details For UID: {uid}

content.query:
union isfuzzy = true corelight_smb_files, corelight_smb_mapping
| where uid == ('{uid}')
content.title: SMB Details For UID: {uid}

content.json: **Refresh the web page to fetch details of recently collected events**
